verbs.description: [ARG0: attorney general oklahoma bureau of narcotics] [V: showcase] [ARG1: new technology to fight opioid crisis] oklahoma city attorney general mike hunter and oklahoma bureau of narcotics obn director john scully today showcased technology utilized to track overdoses across the state urged first responders to sign up for a free training and announced the hiring of 10 compliance officers for opioid dive attorney custer oklahoma bureau of narcotics and dangerous drugs control le flore counties director federal bureau of narcotics technology garvin obn attorney general hunter oklahoma bureau of narcotics oklahoma bureau of narcotics john scully odmap oklahoma city
